rows.label: qst105401_msg0001
rows.name:
I have a request for
you... for you, Rex.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0002
rows.name: For me!? Not for Zeke?

rows.label: qst105401_msg0003
rows.name:
You are the Driver of the Heaven's Holy
Grail, but that appearance of yours...
You are a salvager, are you not?

rows.label: qst105401_msg0004
rows.name:
Yes... Until a little while ago,
I made my living by salvaging.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0005
rows.name:
In fact, when I was young, I
also dabbled in salvaging.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0006
rows.name: What!? Even though you're a king?

rows.label: qst105401_msg0007
rows.name:
I grew tired of the
restrictive royal life...
and traveled all over Alst.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0008
rows.name:
Heh... I can hardly
lecture Zeke, can I?

rows.label: qst105401_msg0009
rows.name:
At that time, I started salvaging out of
curiosity and became engrossed in it... I was
obsessed with collecting legendary treasures.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0010
rows.name: Is that so... That's surprising.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0011
rows.name:
Did you manage to collect
that legendary treasure?

rows.label: qst105401_msg0012
rows.name:
No... I was able to pinpoint its
approximate location, but...

rows.label: qst105401_msg0013
rows.name:
...just as I was about to
calculate the structure for
retrieval, I had to stop.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0014
rows.name:
My father... the previous king,
passed away suddenly, and my
freedom came to an end.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0015
rows.name:
Since then, I haven't been treasure
hunting, let alone salvaging.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0016
rows.name: I see... Why are you telling me this?

rows.label: qst105401_msg0017
rows.name: ...I feel like doing something I enjoy.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0018
rows.name:
I want you to collect the
treasure I was searching for.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0019
rows.name:
I would like to retrieve it
with my own hands, but at my
age, I cannot be so reckless.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0020
rows.name:
In my place, would you
obtain the treasure and
use it to adorn this room?

rows.label: qst105401_msg0021
rows.name:
If it's a treasure hunt,
leave it to me! It's my
profession, after all.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0022
rows.name: An excellent answer...

rows.label: qst105401_msg0023
rows.name:
There are four treasures
I want you to obtain...

rows.label: qst105401_msg0024
rows.name: The Big Hammershead in Temperantia.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0025
rows.name:
It is said that using a top-quality cylinder
in certain weather can lead to the treasure's
location, but details are unknown.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0026
rows.name:
The Golden Sunstone that
sank in the Land of Mors.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0027
rows.name:
Apparently, a salvager failed to
retrieve it at the Cliffs of Mors,
and it sank into the Land of Mors.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0028
rows.name:
The Catastrophe Puzzle...
I heard a Nopon in Avaritia
recently acquired it.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0029
rows.name:
For this one, I want you to
negotiate with the Nopon to
get it, rather than salvaging.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0030
rows.name:
The Orbital Skyreader... a salvage
point in Spirit Crucible Elpys.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0031
rows.name:
There's a place to salvage
in Spirit Crucible Elpys?

rows.label: qst105401_msg0032
rows.name: A blind spot, was it not?

rows.label: qst105401_msg0033
rows.name:
It looks like a mere chasm, but
there are several points that
connect to the Cloud Sea.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0034
rows.name:
But not just here; even if I know
the treasure's location, I do not
know the exact salvage point...

rows.label: qst105401_msg0035
rows.name: For now, I'll try various places!

rows.label: qst105401_msg0036
rows.name:
I apologize for making such
an unreasonable request.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0037
rows.name:
When I was young, this treasure was
the aspiration of all salvagers.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0038
rows.name:
It was said that whoever
collected all four would be
the salvager of salvagers...

rows.label: qst105401_msg0039
rows.name:
...and would be called
the King of Salvagers...

rows.label: qst105401_msg0040
rows.name:
Once you've collected them,
I'd like you to display them
on the pedestals behind me.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0041
rows.name: Pedestals!? You've already made them?

rows.label: qst105401_msg0042
rows.name:
Hehe... I seem to have gotten
a little ahead of myself.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0043
rows.name: Well then, I am counting on you.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0101
rows.name:
I have something to ask of Rex.
Would you let me speak with him?
